text: Kot Samaba railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Kot Samaba village, Rahim Yar Khan district of Punjab province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Rahim Yar Khan District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Kot Samaba railway station
